detaileddescription.para: tripal_set_admin_message(). function theme_tripal_admin_message($variables) { tripal_report_error( 'tripal_deprecated', TRIPAL_NOTICE, "DEPRECATED: %old_function has been replaced with %new_function. Please update your code.", array( 'old_function'=>'chado_get_id_for_node', 'new_function' => 'chado_get_id_from_nid' ) );

New API Function return tripal_set_admin_message(); } Deprecated

detaileddescription.para: Contains all the deprecated functions to keep the tripal api backwards compatible.
